code: import{ADD_ITEM,DELETE_ITEM,GET_ITEMS}from'./types';import axios from'axios';export var getItems=function getItems(data){return{type:GET_ITEMS,payload:data};};export var deleteItems=function deleteItems(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("http://localhost:5000/api/items/".concat(id));dispatch({type:DELETE_ITEM,payload:id});};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return function(dispatch){axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/items',item).then(function(res){console.log(res.data);dispatch({type:ADD_ITEM,payload:res.data});});};};export var setItemsLoading=function setItemsLoading(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/items').then(function(res){dispatch(getItems(res.data));});};};
